thig6.3:1.3: Come, KhemƒÅ, let's have a good time
thig6.3:2.1: This putrid body, diseased and brittle, only brings trials and tribulations.
thig6.3:2.4: I rooted out any craving for sensual pleasures.
thig6.3:3.1: Sensual pleasures are like the handle of an axe, one's aggregates are the executioner's block.
